name: SigNul
description:
~ SigNul ~

The world is under attack and only you can save it!

Take control of the world's most powerful musical weapon - the SigNul and stave off the attackers for as long as you can!

(This game was made in a couple of hours, you're going to have to work with me on this one...)

~ How To Play ~
  • [Up]/[Down] - To change alter the signal and change the tune
  • [X]/[Z] - Start the game, or restart after gameover
  • Each note in the signal tune causes the corresponding turret to shoot
  • Score (shown on the top left) by shooting down the alien attackers!
  • If an alien attacker makes it to a turret you lose a life (shown on the top right)
  • The more you score, the faster the game gets!
  • The game is over when you've lost all your lives
  • Share your highest score in the comments!
